name: Drill
shortDescription: Buy Power Drills for DIY and professional use online in Bangladesh

name: Hacksaw
shortDescription: Hacksaw. It has a thin metal blade and teeth-like cut on either edge

name: Needle-nose pliers
shortDescription: Needle-nose pliers, also known as long-nose pliers and snipe-nose pliers, are both cutting and holding pliers used by artisans, jewellery designers, etc.

name: Tape Measure
shortDescription: A standard tape measure is used for all field measurements, such as setting heights for switches and outlets

name: Screwdriver
shortDescription: Screwdriver. It is a tool with a flat head that helps us to push a screw into a socket.

name: Wrench
shortDescription: Wrench. These are tools that are used to tighten a nut around a bolt so that they don't fall off.
